title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“No gasoline will be sold to anyone in a glass container.” [From a sign in a gas station window in Santa Fe, New Mexico. Submitted by Veronica Egan, Tesuque, New Mexico.]
